message: السلام عليكم، كنت محتاج كورس او توتوريال اذاكر منها asp.net MVC4 ،  ومحتاج كتاب عن best practice in database design. شكرا

data.message:
For MVC 5, a good book is APress Professional ASP .NET MVC 5
A tutorial will be the http://www.asp.net/mvc tutorials they are very goods and they have videos (look at the right side)
هل ده كويس لو انا مشتغلتش mvc قبل كده ، ولا التعامل مع razor views
الاتنين كويسين حتى لو ما اشتغلتوش قبل كده

http://www.asp.net/mvc/tutorials/mvc-5/introduction/getting-started

emshe ma3a el demo da lela5er we taba2 el lessons kollaha men 1 - 11 we hatewsal le mostawa kowayyes geddan fe el MVC we 3an tagroba sha5seya :)

دا كورس اون لاين Asp.net MVC 3 كويس جدا 
http://pluralsight.com/training/Player?author=scott-allen&name=mvc3-building-intro&mode=live&clip=0&course=aspdotnet-mvc3-intro

The MVC 5 version of the video series Ahmed Omaira mentioned in accessible from http://www.asp.net/mvc/videos/pluralsight-aspnet-mvc-5-fundamentals - as mentioned, all resources under http://www.asp.net/mvc are good, and you'll find things specific to MVC 4 as well - to check all videos: http://www.asp.net/mvc/videos

i want to ask about if i don't work MVC before these link is enough 
http://www.asp.net/mvc/videos/pluralsight-aspnet-mvc-5-fundamentals
For ASP.NET MVC I always recommend starting by one of Scott Hanselman's fun videos (you can find them on channel9.msdn.com), then go check any other in-depth tutorials afterwards :)
